attributes.action: Ban the sale of fireworks to public
attributes.additional_details: Kids are getting hold of fireworks and setting them off dangerously. People are attaching them to small animals thinking its funny. And pets are getting seriously petrified because of them. If people want to see fireworks they can go to an arranged professional display
attributes.background: Make the sale of fireworks to the public illegal.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319891
